definition[0]: to make someone stop shouting, talking, crying etc
example[0]: Ella asked them to hush their voices.
example[1]: The audience hushed as he stepped onto the stage.
definition[2]: used to tell people to be quiet, or to comfort a child who is crying or upset
example[2]: Hush, now. Try to get to sleep.
definition[3]: a period of silence, especially when people are expecting something to happen
example[3]: A sudden hush fell over the crowd.
